import React from 'react' import './ImageSlider.css' const ImageSlider = () => { let index = 0; const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide'); const totalSlides = slides.length; function showSlide(i) { slides[index].classList.remove('active'); index = (index + i + totalSlides) % totalSlides; slides[index].classList.add('active'); } // Automatically switch slides every 3 seconds //setInterval(() => showSlide(1), 3000); // Initialize the first slide slides[index].classList.add('active'); return ( <> Image Slider
